explains: vt. 给……装上罩；给……戴上帽子
n. （Bonnet）人名；（英）邦尼特；（法、意）博内；（德、西、葡、捷）邦内特

sentences.en: Welcome to sit on my bonnet!
The woman moved nearer to him and peered under his bonnet keenly and closely.
sentences.cn: 那女人靠近他，仔细地端详着他女帽下面的脸。

sentences.en: The clerk stared at him and the rusty black bonnet a moment, and then laughed.
sentences.cn: 店员盯着他和他那顶褪了色的黑色女帽看了一会儿，然后笑了起来。
